_description: Complete column definitions for Windows Installer database tables

msi_tables.name: ActionText
msi_tables.description: Contains text displayed in the progress dialog during installation. Maps actions to descriptive strings shown to users.

msi_tables.name: AdminExecuteSequence
msi_tables.description: Sequence table for administrative installation. Contains actions executed during 'msiexec /a' administrative installs.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Name of the action to execute.

msi_tables.name: AdminUISequence
msi_tables.description: Sequence table for administrative UI. Contains UI actions during administrative installation.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Name of the action to execute.

msi_tables.name: AdvtExecuteSequence
msi_tables.description: Sequence table for advertised installation. Contains actions for feature advertisement without full install.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Name of the action to execute.

msi_tables.name: AdvtUISequence
msi_tables.description: Sequence table for advertised UI. Contains UI-related actions during advertisement.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Name of the action to execute.

msi_tables.name: AppId
msi_tables.description: Contains information for DCOM application registration including RemoteServerName and activation settings.

msi_tables.name: AppSearch
msi_tables.description: Maps properties to signatures for searching installed applications, files, or registry entries.

columns.name: Property
columns.description: Property to set with search result.

msi_tables.name: BBControl
msi_tables.description: Billboard control table. Defines controls displayed on billboard dialogs during file copying.

msi_tables.name: Billboard
msi_tables.description: Contains billboard information displayed during lengthy operations like file copying.

msi_tables.name: Binary
msi_tables.description: Stores binary data like icons, bitmaps, and custom action DLLs embedded in the MSI package.

msi_tables.name: BindImage
msi_tables.description: Contains information for binding executable files to DLLs during installation.

msi_tables.name: CCPSearch
msi_tables.description: Compliance Checking Program search. Contains signatures for CCP product validation.

msi_tables.name: CheckBox
msi_tables.description: Defines checkbox control values. Maps checkbox controls to property values.

msi_tables.name: Class
msi_tables.description: COM class registration table. Contains CLSID, ProgID, and InprocServer information for COM components.

msi_tables.name: ComboBox
msi_tables.description: Defines values for combo box controls. Contains property, order, value, and text for each item.

msi_tables.name: CompLocator
msi_tables.description: Component locator table. Searches for components by ComponentId to find installed paths.

msi_tables.name: Complus
msi_tables.description: COM+ application registration table. Contains information for COM+ component services.

msi_tables.name: Component
msi_tables.description: Core table defining installation components. Each component has unique GUID, directory, and key path.

msi_tables.name: Condition
msi_tables.description: Feature-level conditions table. Contains conditions that affect feature installation states.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: New install level if condition is true.

msi_tables.name: Control
msi_tables.description: Dialog control definitions. Contains all controls (buttons, text, checkboxes) for each dialog.

msi_tables.name: ControlCondition
msi_tables.description: Dynamic control state conditions. Enables/disables/shows/hides controls based on property values.

msi_tables.name: ControlEvent
msi_tables.description: Control event subscriptions. Maps control actions to events like NewDialog, SetProperty, DoAction.

msi_tables.name: CreateFolder
msi_tables.description: Empty folder creation table. Lists directories to create even without files installed.

msi_tables.name: CustomAction
msi_tables.description: Custom action definitions. Contains type, source, target for DLL, EXE, script, and property actions.

msi_tables.name: Dialog
msi_tables.description: Dialog definitions table. Contains dialog dimensions, title, and attributes for all installer dialogs.

msi_tables.name: Directory
msi_tables.description: Directory structure table. Defines folder hierarchy with parent references and default paths.

msi_tables.name: DrLocator
msi_tables.description: Directory locator for searches. Used by AppSearch to locate directories on the system.

msi_tables.name: DuplicateFile
msi_tables.description: File duplication table. Creates copies of installed files to additional locations.

msi_tables.name: Environment
msi_tables.description: Environment variable table. Defines environment variables to set, append, or remove.

msi_tables.name: Error
msi_tables.description: Error message table. Contains localized error messages for MSI error codes.

msi_tables.name: EventMapping
msi_tables.description: Maps control events to control attributes. Used for progress bar and status text updates.

msi_tables.name: Extension
msi_tables.description: File extension registration. Associates file extensions with ProgIds for shell integration.

msi_tables.name: Feature
msi_tables.description: Feature hierarchy table. Defines installable features with parent relationships and install levels.

msi_tables.name: FeatureComponents
msi_tables.description: Feature-component mapping. Links components to features they belong to.

msi_tables.name: File
msi_tables.description: File table. Contains all files to install with version, size, and component references.

msi_tables.name: FileSFPCatalog
msi_tables.description: System File Protection catalog mapping. Links files to SFP catalog files.

msi_tables.name: Font
msi_tables.description: Font registration table. Contains font files to register with Windows font system.

msi_tables.name: Icon
msi_tables.description: Icon storage table. Contains icon files used for shortcuts and ARP entries.

msi_tables.name: IniFile
msi_tables.description: INI file modification table. Defines INI file entries to create or modify.

msi_tables.name: IniLocator
msi_tables.description: INI file locator for searches. Reads INI values during AppSearch.

msi_tables.name: InstallExecuteSequence
msi_tables.description: Main execution sequence. Contains all actions for installation including file copying and registration.

msi_tables.name: InstallUISequence
msi_tables.description: UI sequence table. Contains dialog display and UI-related actions during installation.

msi_tables.name: IsolatedComponent
msi_tables.description: Side-by-side component isolation. Redirects shared component to application-private location.

msi_tables.name: LaunchCondition
msi_tables.description: Installation prerequisites. Contains conditions that must be true for installation to proceed.

msi_tables.name: ListBox
msi_tables.description: List box control values. Defines items displayed in list box controls.

msi_tables.name: ListView
msi_tables.description: List view control values. Defines items with icons for list view controls.

msi_tables.name: LockPermissions
msi_tables.description: Security permissions table. Sets ACLs on files, registry keys, and folders.

msi_tables.name: MIME
msi_tables.description: MIME type registration. Associates MIME content types with file extensions.

msi_tables.name: Media
msi_tables.description: Source media table. Defines cabinet files, disk prompts, and volume labels for source files.

msi_tables.name: MoveFile
msi_tables.description: File move/copy operations. Moves or copies existing files during installation.

msi_tables.name: MsiAssembly
msi_tables.description: .NET and Win32 assembly registration. Registers assemblies with the Global Assembly Cache.

msi_tables.name: MsiAssemblyName
msi_tables.description: Assembly name attributes. Contains assembly identity information (name, version, culture, token).

msi_tables.name: MsiDigitalCertificate
msi_tables.description: Digital certificate storage. Contains certificates for package signing verification.

msi_tables.name: MsiDigitalSignature
msi_tables.description: Digital signature table. Links signed objects to their certificates.

msi_tables.name: MsiDriverPackages
msi_tables.description: Driver package registration. Contains driver packages for DIFx installation.

msi_tables.name: MsiEmbeddedChainer
msi_tables.description: Embedded chainer for multiple package installation. Chains MSI packages together.

msi_tables.name: MsiEmbeddedUI
msi_tables.description: Embedded UI handler. Contains custom UI DLLs for enhanced installation experience.

msi_tables.name: MsiFileHash
msi_tables.description: File hash values. Contains MD5 hashes for unversioned file change detection.

msi_tables.name: MsiLockPermissionsEx
msi_tables.description: Extended permissions using SDDL strings.

msi_tables.name: MsiPackageCertificate
msi_tables.description: Package certificate association. Links external packages to verification certificates.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchCertificate
msi_tables.description: Patch certificate table. Contains certificates for patch verification.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchHeaders
msi_tables.description: Patch header storage. Contains patch header blobs for delta patching.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchMetadata
msi_tables.description: Patch metadata table. Contains patch description, classification, and targets.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchOldAssemblyFile
msi_tables.description: Old assembly file references for patching. Maps old assembly files to patches.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchOldAssemblyName
msi_tables.description: Old assembly names for patching. Contains previous assembly identities.

msi_tables.name: MsiPatchSequence
msi_tables.description: Patch sequencing information. Determines patch application order.

msi_tables.name: MsiSFCBypass
msi_tables.description: System File Checker bypass. Lists protected files that can be replaced during install.

msi_tables.name: MsiServiceConfig
msi_tables.description: Service configuration table. Contains delayed auto-start and failure action settings.

msi_tables.name: MsiServiceConfigFailureActions
msi_tables.description: Service failure recovery. Defines actions on service failure (restart, reboot, run command).

msi_tables.name: MsiShortcutProperty
msi_tables.description: Contains extended shortcut properties.

msi_tables.name: ODBCAttribute
msi_tables.description: ODBC driver/DSN attributes. Contains name-value pairs for ODBC configuration.

msi_tables.name: ODBCDataSource
msi_tables.description: ODBC data source registration. Defines DSNs to create with driver and attributes.

msi_tables.name: ODBCDriver
msi_tables.description: ODBC driver registration. Registers ODBC drivers with the system.

msi_tables.name: ODBCSourceAttribute
msi_tables.description: ODBC source attributes. Additional attributes for data source configuration.

msi_tables.name: ODBCTranslator
msi_tables.description: ODBC translator registration. Registers ODBC translators for code page conversion.

msi_tables.name: Patch
msi_tables.description: Patch file mapping. Maps files to their patch transformations.

msi_tables.name: PatchPackage
msi_tables.description: Embedded patch packages. Contains sub-patches within a patch package.

msi_tables.name: ProgId
msi_tables.description: Programmatic identifier registration. Associates ProgIds with CLSIDs and file extensions.

msi_tables.name: Property
msi_tables.description: Property table. Contains installation properties including ProductCode, ProductName, Manufacturer.

msi_tables.name: PublishComponent
msi_tables.description: Component publishing. Publishes components for use by other applications via qualified components.

msi_tables.name: RadioButton
msi_tables.description: Radio button group values. Defines radio button items with positions and values.

msi_tables.name: RegLocator
msi_tables.description: Registry locator for searches. Reads registry values during AppSearch.

msi_tables.name: Registry
msi_tables.description: Registry operations table. Contains registry keys and values to create or modify.

msi_tables.name: RemoveFile
msi_tables.description: File removal table. Removes files on install, uninstall, or both.

msi_tables.name: RemoveIniFile
msi_tables.description: INI entry removal. Removes specific INI file entries during installation.

msi_tables.name: RemoveRegistry
msi_tables.description: Registry removal table. Removes registry keys or values during installation.

msi_tables.name: ReserveCost
msi_tables.description: Disk space reservation. Reserves additional disk space beyond file sizes.

msi_tables.name: SFPCatalog
msi_tables.description: System File Protection catalogs. Contains catalog files for Windows File Protection.

msi_tables.name: SelfReg
msi_tables.description: Self-registration table. Lists DLLs to self-register via DllRegisterServer.

msi_tables.name: ServiceControl
msi_tables.description: Service start/stop/delete. Controls Windows services during install and uninstall.

msi_tables.name: ServiceInstall
msi_tables.description: Service installation table. Creates Windows services with name, display name, and start type.

msi_tables.name: Shortcut
msi_tables.description: Shortcut creation table. Defines Start Menu and desktop shortcuts with targets and icons.

msi_tables.name: Signature
msi_tables.description: File signature definitions. Describes files for AppSearch using name, version, size.

msi_tables.name: TextStyle
msi_tables.description: Text formatting styles. Defines fonts, sizes, and colors for dialog text.

msi_tables.name: TypeLib
msi_tables.description: Type library registration. Registers COM type libraries (.tlb) with version and language.

msi_tables.name: UIText
msi_tables.description: UI string table. Contains localized strings for dialog controls and messages.

msi_tables.name: Upgrade
msi_tables.description: Upgrade detection table. Finds related products by UpgradeCode for major upgrade handling.

msi_tables.name: Verb
msi_tables.description: Shell verb registration. Defines shell commands (Open, Edit, Print) for file extensions.

msi_tables.name: _Columns
msi_tables.description: Schema metadata. Describes columns for all tables in the database.

msi_tables.name: _Storages
msi_tables.description: Storage metadata. Lists embedded storages (substorage streams) in the MSI.

msi_tables.name: _Streams
msi_tables.description: Stream metadata. Lists binary streams embedded in the MSI (cabs, icons, binaries).

msi_tables.name: _Tables
msi_tables.description: Table metadata. Lists all tables present in the MSI database.

msi_tables.name: _TransformView
msi_tables.description: System table for viewing transform changes.

msi_tables.name: _Validation
msi_tables.description: Column validation rules. Contains data type, nullable, and range constraints for all columns.
